person.bio: The relentlessly helpful office administrator in Mazraa, but she is also like a bookkeeper. Admin & Bookkeeping fell in love with Threefold The feeling of contributing to something larger than myself... very significant.
person.excerpt: The relentlessly helpful office administrator in Mazraa.
